Calculate the normalized logEC50

Source: R/score.R
calculate_norm_logEC50.Rd

calculate_norm_logEC50() computes the normalized (feature scaled) logEC50. The minimal logEC50 is defined as x1 - log_extra and the maximal logEC50 as x2 + log_extra, where x1 and x2 are the lowest and highest tested logarithmic concentration.

Usage

calculate_norm_logEC50(logEC50, x1, x2, log_extra)

Arguments

logEC50

Logarithmic area-under-the-curve

x1

Numeric indicating the minimal tested logarithmic concentration

x2

Numeric indicating the maximal tested logarithmic concentration

log_extra

Integer indicating the extra log orders around the measured concentration range beyond which the logEC50 is clipped

Value

Normalized EC50 for the logarithmic dose response curve

On this page
